description.message: ChatGPTalk サイドバー拡張機能を使うと、ChatGPTを用いてWebページの本文を簡単に要約できます。

default_prompt1_value.message:
Summarize the provided text into concise bullet points. Include one fitting emoji per point to enhance readability. Respond in Japanese. Here is the content:
{{CONTENT}}

default_prompt2_value.message: Please translate the following text into Japanese: {{CONTENT}}

default_prompt3_value.message:
Format the transcript below in Japanese to make it easy to read. Use emojis and other enhancements for better readability:
{{CONTENT}}

default_prompt4_value.message:
Extract the main content from the following HTML and convert it into well-structured Markdown format. Please respond in Japanese:
{{HTML}}

default_prompt5_value.message: Please proofread the above text to ensure it is clear and easy to understand for first-time readers. Clearly explain what the content is about. If any information seems missing, include annotations suggesting where additional details should be added. Please respond in Japanese.

sidepanel_maxCharstoSplit.message: 文字列を分割する最大文字数

sidepanel_promptTemplate.message: プロンプトテンプレート

options_prompt.message: プロンプトテンプレート

options_maxCharsToSplit.message: 文字列を分割する最大文字数
